event.title: climbed and turned into the wind after 2-years

data.event: Heading into the sky over Gainesville, the restored P-40 Curtiss Warhawk climbed and turned into the wind after 2-years of restoration to join the Commemorative Air Force (CAF) tours in Texas and Florida.
On Jan. 19, 1967, right after I graduated from North Texas, I went straight to the airport and bought some aviation lessons.

event.title: ’ve been doing this off and on for two years

data.event: “We’ve been doing this off and on for two years.
